text: Sergio Sebastiani (11 April 1931 â€“ 16 January 2024) was an Italian prelate of the Catholic Church. He was head of the Prefecture for the Economic Affairs of the Holy See from 1997 to 2008. He was made a cardinal in 2001. From 1960 to 1994 he worked in the diplomatic service of the Holy See. He became an archbishop and apostolic nuncio in 1976. Sebastiani was born in Montemonaco, Italy. ==Death== Sebastiani died on 16 January 2024 in Rome, Italy at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic archbishops Category:Italian cardinals
title: Sergio Sebastiani
